tasya vyanat ca avyanat cahinaḥ tu śaradā aśaniḥ
yadi uvā eṣi dvipadī asmān yadi vā eṣi catuṣpadī
nirastā atas avratā asmābhiḥ kartuḥ aṣṭāpadī gṛham

yam dviṣmaḥ yaḥ cana udveṣṭi aghāyuḥ yaḥ cana śapāt

tasya tvam bhindhi adhiṣṭhāya pada āviṣ pūryate śiraḥ
abhiprehi sahasra akṣam yuktvā āśum śapatha ratham
śatrūn anvicchatī kṛtya vṛkī iva avi vṛtaḥ gṛhān
pariṇaḥ vṛndhi śapathān dahan agniḥ iva vrajam
śatrūn reva āvinaḥ jahi divyā vṛkṣam iva aśaniḥ
śatrūn me proṣṭa śapathān kṛtyāḥ ca suhṛdaḥ hṛdyāḥ
jihmāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ ca durhṛdaḥ samiddham jātavedasam
asapatnam purastāt naḥ śivam dakṣiṇatas kṛdhi

mṛgasya ahi mṛgāriḥ tvam tantu amnikartum arhasi
aghnyā āsye ghora rūpe vara rūpe vināśani
